trends: There have been 59 other sightings in Tulsa
There were no other sightings in Tulsa on or around December 2nd 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in the front yard smoking a cigar...the sky seemed cloudy..nostars...then one by one the stars appeared...normal brightness strange pattern..ther were seven or eight stars all lined up in a straight line...three wereclose together..then they seperated...not far but far enough to notice...as Istared straight at a abnormaly blinking star, I noticed it wobbleing back andforth, up and down side to side...if I moved my vision slightly, It would appearin its normal position...due south of my house...then I saw the first of about15 to 20 crafts fly over my house...it was square shaped, with the edges cutoff..almost octagon shaped...It had lights around the botom, like a normalpassenger jet would..only with one at the rear and at each cut corner..only witha brighter one in the middle...the outer, were bright white..the middle wasbright red...these lightsstobed in a circular pattern, giving the apperance of the craft being round...then they began to blink in an almost moris code pattern...two reds, one white..two whites one red...then four then one two one two three...I counted them outloud,it seemed as though they could here me or read my thoughts...I started laughingout loud...this kept on until it faded out of my sight...due west of my house..then the next one...same thing..different flight pattern....then it fadedaway...then suddenly it was one half mile closer to me, in a split second....It appeared so fast I think it may have been another craft coming out of acloaked state...invisable, almost..I saw a slight blur when it appeared...then several more did the same fly over as the first...they were dark grayblackacross the underside....flying at a normal slowish speed appearing to be showingthemselfs to me,...since all of them flew over or around my home...they made noaudible sound...nothing...no whisper...no roar...they were 700 ft up...some lower...then I saw an amazing shooting star...just west of my house....Itwas brighter than Ive ever seen before...with a very long srteem behind..with afirery ball in front...then more crafts....then as I saw another coming in thedistance, A smaller jet dashed towards the craft...It was heading in anintercept course, but as it got closer to the craft,it flew under it...directlyin front of its position....it just kept on flying straightahead...the craft flew right on by me....then I saw a bright white light flyingback the opposite direction of all these crafts...much
